name: @karpo/i18n-transformer
description: An automatic i18n conversion Vite/Webpack plugin.

scripts.release: pnpm run build && npm publish && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:shared: pnpm run clear && pnpm -r --filter=./packages/shared run release && rollup -c && npm publish ./packages/shared/dist && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:vite-plugin: pnpm run clear && pnpm -r --filter=./packages/vite-plugin run release && rollup -c && npm publish ./packages/vite-plugin/dist && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:webpack-plugin: pnpm run clear && pnpm -r --filter=./packages/webpack-plugin run release && rollup -c && npm publish ./packages/webpack-plugin/dist && git push --follow-tags origin main

author: Banana-energy
